/bin/c++ -fPIC  -march=core-avx2    -std=c++11   -O3 -DNDEBUG -funroll-all-loops -fexcess-precision=fast      -shared -Wl,-soname,libgpu_utilstest_cuda.so -o ../../../../lib/libgpu_utilstest_cuda.so CMakeFiles/gpu_utilstest_cuda.dir/gpu_utilstest_cuda_generated_devicetransfers.cu.o  /apps/cuda/10.1/lib64/libcudart_static.a -lpthread -ldl /usr/lib64/librt.so /work_bgfs/g/gdayhoff/grayson/lab/gmx+/local/lib/libhwloc.so -ldl -lrt /usr/lib64/librt.so /work_bgfs/g/gdayhoff/grayson/lab/gmx+/local/lib/libhwloc.so -lrt
